cn.inbot.padbotsdk

Class RobotManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.inbot.padbotsdk.RobotManager

  • public class RobotManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Robot Management Class

    This class is a singleton mode class. Use getInstance(application) method to get the instance. The instance provide all the operations about the robot, including connecting robots, controlling robots and so on. If you connect the robot via Bluetooth, you must scan the robot before connecting.

    Author : Inbot
    Create Date : 2017/5/11
    JDK version used : JDK1.8
    Version : V3.0.0
    Copyright Â©2017 Inbot Technology Ltd. All rights reserved.

      • connectRobotByBluetooth

        public void connectRobotByBluetooth(java.lang.String serialNumber)
        Connect the robot by bluetooth. If your robot module is U series or T series, use this method to connect the robot.
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - The serial number of the robot

      • connectRobotBySerialPort

        public void connectRobotBySerialPort()
        Connect the robot by serial port. If your robot module is X series or P series, use this method to connect the robot.
